GSP29vnyps31u:1: nyā. pa. śa. 1 athānumodayaṃ smṛtyā hetutvenāpi saṃsthitm /
GSP29vnyps31u:5: nacānāptoktavākyaṃ pramāṇaṃ, kāraṇadoṣabādhakadarśanāt, na ca vākyatvādibhirbādhaḥ; svavacanavirodhāt
GSP29vnyps31u:14: tasya cātrābhāvāt, kvācitkadoṣadarśanasya ca pratyakṣādāvapi asamatvāt,
GSP29vnyps31u:15: svataḥ parato vā prāmāṇye ca tato viśeṣābhāvāt //
GSP29vnyps31u:16: nyā. pa. śa. 2 tacca vedyāṃśe pratyakṣātiriktam, asākṣātkāritvāt,
GSP29vnyps31u:29: āgāmonumānaṃ, saṃbandhagrahaṇe satyeva bodhakatvāditi cenna; bodhya bodhakabhāvātiriktasaṃbandhagrahaṇāpekṣiṇyanumānatvaniyamāt
GSP29vnyps31u:30: na cātra tadatiriktaḥ saṃbandhaḥ, yadgrahaṇaṃ niyamenāpekṣyeta /
GSP29vnyps31u:36: ata eva hyanyathānyathā prakṛtipratyayādikaṃ vyākaraṇāntareṣu kalpyate /
GSP29vnyps31u:38: ata eva na bhāṣāntaravat tatklaptiḥ, nityavedagatatvācca /
GSP29vnyps31u:39: yāni vaidikāni padāni tānyeva laukikanīti “vedaśabdebhya evādau”
GSP29vnyps31u:44: uktaṃ caitadvedārthasaṃgrahepi--- “vaidikā eva sarve vācakāḥ śabdāśca---”
GSP29vnyps31u:48: taddvidhā, anvitārthamananvitārthaṃ ca, ādyaṃ yathā---agniruṣṇaḥ, āpo
GSP29vnyps31u:53: ata eva laukikavākye dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya na jhaṭati
GSP29vnyps31u:60: tathaiva hi tasya vyutpattiḥ” ityuktvā “nanvanuvādakatayaiva vyutpattiḥ
GSP29vnyps31u:61_2: na mānatābhaṅgaḥ” ityādi uktaṃ ca prajñāparitrāṇe --- “pauruṣeyagiraḥ śaṅkāgrastā
GSP29vnyps31u:66: asau ca nānṛtaṃ vakti saṃjñātvārthaṃ tadabravīt //
GSP29vnyps31u:71: nanvevaṃ laukikaṃ vākyaṃ liṅgaṃ celliṅgavat tataḥ /
GSP29vnyps31u:80: yā siddhaviṣayā buddhiḥ sā śabdī nānumānukī” iti /
GSP29vnyps31u:83: apauruṣeyaṃ tu sarvamanvitārthamevākintu ādityo yūpaḥ-- ityādiṣūpacārato nirvāhaḥ /
GSP29vnyps31u:84: ākāṅkṣāsattivogyatāvanti hi padānyanvitamabhidadhati, anvaye vā viśrāmyanti /
GSP29vnyps31u:92: tatra pūrveṇa pravṛttirlakṣaṇā, yathā---gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ prativasatītyatra gaṅgaśabdasya pravāhaviśeṣarūpavācyasaṃbandhini tīre /
GSP29vnyps31u:95: yathā siṃho devadatta ityatra siṃhmaśabdasya śauryādigūṇaṇyogini devadatte
GSP29vnyps31u:108: abhihitānvaye hi padānāṃ padārthe padārthānāṃ vāvayārthe padānāṃ ca tatreti śaktitrayakalpanāgāraivaṃ syāt, vākyārthasyāśābdatvaprasaṅgo vā /
GSP29vnyps31u:129: anvitābhidhānānupapatteśca” ityādiṣu bahuṣu pradeśeṣu anvitābhidhānameva māyāvādinaṃ pratyuktam
GSP29vnyps31u:151: bhāṣyepi “śabdasya tu viśeṣeṇa saviśeṣa eva vastunyabhidhānasāmarthyaṃ,
GSP29vnyps31u:153: prakṛtipratyayayogena hi padatvam; prakṛtipratyayorarthabhedena padasyaiva viśiṣṭārthapratipādanamavarjanīyam
GSP29vnyps31u:162: śabdasyāyamartha iti pūrvavṛddhaiḥ śikṣitaḥ” ityādi coktvā, “evameva
GSP29vnyps31u:163: sarvapadānāṃ svārthābhidhāyitvaṃ saṃghātaviśeṣāṇāṃ ca yathāvasthitasaṃsargaviśeṣavācitvaṃ ca jānāti” ityādyuktam //
GSP29vnyps31u:166: tatra ca “teṣu teṣvartheṣu teṣāṃ śabdānāṃ prayogo bodhakatvanibandhanaḥ iti niścinvanti” ityādyuktam /
GSP29vnyps31u:169: yadināmānvitābhidhānamabhimataṃ; tadā kathamiva padamātre vyutpattiḥ syāt /
GSP29vnyps31u:170: yadi ca sā syāt, kathamanvitamabhidheyam, vyutpattivaiparītyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29vnyps31u:171: tasmānnānvitābhidhānameva siddhānta iti nirṇetuṃ śakyam, iti kecit //
GSP29vnyps31u:172: nyā. pa. śa. 6 anye tu “bodhakānām” ityādivākyamanvite saṃsargaviśeṣasiddherupapadyate /
GSP29vnyps31u:176: padārthaṃ smārayitvaiva hi padāni vakyārthaṃ bodhayantītyuktan /
GSP29vnyps31u:183: nyā. pa. śa. 7 ata eva viśiṣṭārthābhidhāyitvepi viśeṣaṇamatre śaktiḥ ityapi nirastam; abhidhāyitvātiriktaśaktyantarābhāvāt
GSP29vnyps31u:185: viśiṣṭānupraviṣṭaṃ hi viśeṣaṇaṃ pareparañjakaveṣameveti tādṛgākāro viśeṣyagrahaṇamantareṇa durgrahaḥ /
GSP29vnyps31u:186: tāvatā ca tadarthaṃ viśeṣyagrahaṇamiti vyarthaṃ vacaḥ /
GSP29vnyps31u:193: vijñāpya yadi śabdasya tatra śaktirna kiṃ bhavet /
GSP29vnyps31u:198: pāratantryaṃ svarūpaṃ cet tulyaṃ niṣkarṣakepi tat /
GSP29vnyps31u:208: nyā. pa. śa. 8 yattu “na lokavyutpattihaniḥ, tatraiva śakteḥ” iti ṣaḍarthasaṃkṣepe śrīrāmamiśrairuktam, tadapi tatra śaktyabhāvapratikṣepaparam /
GSP29vnyps31u:211: yaccātmasiddhau “yathā gavādipadaśaktirekabuddhisiddhepi sāmānyaviśeṣātmake vastuni sāmānyāṃśena saṃbadhyate” iti /
GSP29vnyps31u:218: nyā. pa. śa. 9 ato niṣkarṣakaśabdātiriktānāmapṛthaksiddhaviśeṣaṇavācināṃ viśeṣyaparyavasānavyutpatteḥ śarīravācināṃ devādiśabdānāmapi yathāprayogaṃ śarīriparyavasānaṃ siddham /
GSP29vnyps31u:223: ata eva ca tasya sarvaśabdavācyatvamapi śrūyateth; tadeva ca vyajyate
GSP29vnyps31u:225: smaryate ca--- “sarvaṃ samāpnoṣi tatosi sarvaḥ” iti /
GSP29vnyps31u:226: sūtritaṃ ca--- “carācaravyapāśrayastu syāt tadvyapadeśo bhāktastadbhāvabhāvitvāt” iti /
GSP29vnyps31u:229: ato vācyaikadeśe jīve lakṣaṇā, gaṅgāśabdasya tīra iva” iti /
GSP29vnyps31u:232: ata eva hi bhāktapadasya bhaktyā vyapadeśārthatvamapi bhāṣyakārairuktam /
GSP29vnyps31u:233: viśiṣṭaveṣasya śaktiviṣayatvāt tattyoge kathaṃ na lakṣaṇeti cet,
GSP29vnyps31u:236: nyā. pa. śa. 10 nanu “tattvamasi” ityatra tvamiti śvetaketumātranirdeśe
GSP29vnyps31u:249: tāvatā tu śabdānāṃ na tatparyantatvasiddhiḥ iti //
GSP29vnyps31u:250: nyā. pa. śa. 11 atrocyate saṃbuddhistāvadatra ātmavidyopadeśena
GSP29vnyps31u:257: atastvaccharīrakaṃ brahmeti vivakṣāyāṃ satyāṃ tvaṃ taditi nirdeśamātramupapannam /
GSP29vnyps31u:265: punarāvṛttaḥ suvarṇapiṇḍaḥ khadirāṅgārasavarṇe kuṇḍale bhavataḥ” ityādiṣu
GSP29vnyps31u:270: athāṃśabhedādinā vibhajya karaṇatvādivivakṣayā kathañcinnirvāhaḥ, tathā viśiṣṭākārādibhedavivakṣayā vibhajyātrāpi nirvāhamanumanyethāḥ /
GSP29vnyps31u:275: na ca tvaddṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ sthāṇuritivat “puruṣa evedaṃ sarvam” “tattvamasi”
GSP29vnyps31u:278: cidaṃśasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tu na bādhasaham, tvayāpi tatsatyatvābhyupagamāt /
GSP29vnyps31u:279: svarūpaikyavidhāne ca viruddhadharmapratirodhāt, tatparityāge padayoranatiriktārthatayā paryāyapadasāmānādhikaraṇyaprasaṅgāt,
GSP29vnyps31u:280: dvārābhāvena mukhyavṛttibādhāpatteḥ, gatyantare ca saṃbhavati tadayogāt,
GSP29vnyps31u:281: svarūpamātranirdeśe ca padāntaravaiyarthyāt, svarūpabhedasya ca bahupramāṇasiddhatvāt //
GSP29vnyps31u:284: na cātra viśeṣaṇabhedādviviśeṣyabhedāprasaṅgaḥ, viruddhaviśeṣaṇābhāvāt; na hi ghaṭapaṭādiṣviva virodhaḥ /
GSP29vnyps31u:285: yathā ca pratyakṣe nīlatvotpalatvāderavirodho darśanabalāt, tathātrāpi /
GSP29vnyps31u:286: na ca satyatvajñānatvādervaiyadhikaraṇyaniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ, yena virodhaḥ syāt
GSP29vnyps31u:287: viśeṣyaikyapare tu sāmānādhikaraṇye viśeṣaṇānāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayośca mitho bhedo guṇa eva
GSP29vnyps31u:291: yugapadanekaviśiṣṭaikābhidhānāt, anūdya vidhāneṣvapi yathā vyutpatti dharmapradhānatvācca
GSP29vnyps31u:292: nyā. pa. śa. 13 na ca viśeṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ viśeṣaṇāntarāsaham,
GSP29vnyps31u:293_1: evantvādidaṃ viśiṣṭabodhakaṃ na bhavatītyādi vyavahārasyāpi vilopaḥ syāt /
GSP29vnyps31u:294: na ca śabdane pratipādane tathā, aviśeṣāt, pratyakṣādivacchabdenāpi yathāvastu bodhanīyatvāt
GSP29vnyps31u:295: viśeṣaṇamātraparatvaṃ tu nābhyupagatameva, yena viśiṣṭaikyāsiddhiḥ syāt /
GSP29vnyps31u:296_1: pravṛttinimittānāṃ viśeṣaṇānāṃ tyāgāt, viśeṣyamātrasya ca dvārarahitasyālakṣyatvāt /
GSP29vnyps31u:297: itaravyāvṛttīnāṃ tūpalakṣaṇatve svarūpatve ca padāntaravaiyarthyādidoṣaḥ sa eva //
GSP29vnyps31u:298: nyā. pa. śa. 14 evaṃ tāsāṃ viśeṣaṇatve
GSP29vnyps31u:301_0: vipratipannaṃ vākyamakhaṇḍaparam, samānādhikaraṇavākyatvāt, soyaṃ devadattaḥ iti
GSP29vnyps31u:301_1: vākyavat, yadvā lakṣaṇavākyatvāt, prakṛṣṭaprakāśaścandraḥ ityādivat iti cenna, dṛṣṭāntāsiddheḥ,
GSP29vnyps31u:302: yugapat tayorvyāghāta iti cenna, yaugapadyasyānabhidhānāt, anākṣepācca /
GSP29vnyps31u:303: yugapat pratipattistu na doṣaḥ, anyathā pratyabhijñābhaṅge kṣaṇabhaṅganairātmyāpalāpādivādā vijayeran /
GSP29vnyps31u:304: tathāpyatītatvavartamānatve kathamekasya ? iti cet, svapradhvaṃsakāle hi svayamatītaḥ syāt, na cāsau pradhvastaḥ, vartamānatvopalaṃbhāt;
GSP29vnyps31u:307: pratibandhyupādhibhedenobhayopapatteḥ, anyathā kṣaṇasyāpi pūrvāparamadhyavartinaḥ kṣodaprasaṅgāt; na hi tasya pūrvasmādapi
GSP29vnyps31u:310: tiṣṭhattvetat; dvitīyopi dṛṣṭānto viśiṣṭapara eva, anyathā
GSP29vnyps31u:315: vyadhikaraṇavākyavat, iti bādhakamanumānamapi, pratipattyanurodhāt dṛṣṭāntasiddheścāsya balīyastvam
GSP29vnyps31u:318: ekasminniti vyadhikaraṇānāṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭaityādyananvitānāṃ ca vyavacchedārtham /
GSP29vnyps31u:319: śabdānām arthe iti ca vyaktyarthameva, arthe iti viśeṣyasya pradhānatayā vācyatvasūcanārthaṃ vā /
GSP29vnyps31u:320: tena vyadhikaraṇavākyeṣvekapradhānārthe vṛttisaṃbhavepiva tasya viśeṣyatavabhāvād vyavacchedyatā
GSP29vnyps31u:321: viśeṣyabodhanavyāpāro vṛttiḥ pravṛttiriti ca sāmānyato viśeṣataścātrocyate
GSP29vnyps31u:324: tatra yadupādhikā viśeṣye śabdavṛttiḥ, tat pravṛttinimittam /
GSP29vnyps31u:326: nyā. pa. śa. 15 nanu pauruṣeyaṃ sarvamanvitārthamiti pratipāditam,
GSP29vnyps31u:328: cenna, svataḥ prāmāṇyāt, svarasato hi sarvaṃ
GSP29vnyps31u:331: tataḥ svābhāvikamapi prāmāṇyaṃ pratibandhakena doṣeṇa kvacidapahnutam;
GSP29vnyps31u:340: tadvat pramāpi samyaṅmithyābodhasādhāraṇādatiriktasahitā jāyate, kāryatve sati tadviśeṣatvāt, apramāvat; prāmāṇyaṃ parato jñāyate, anabhyāsadaśāyāṃ
GSP29vnyps31u:341: sāṃśayikatvāt, aprāmāṇyavat, iti cet, tatra prathame kṛtsnapramāpakṣīkāre
GSP29vnyps31u:345: tarhi viśeṣaṇaṃ na prayokṣyāmahe iti cenna,
GSP29vnyps31u:347: anabhyupagateśvaraiḥ saugatādibhirevaṃ prayoge kaḥ parihāraḥ iti cenna,
GSP29vnyps31u:349: śrutisiddhanityapramāvyavacchedena kāryatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ saphalaṃ syāt hi cet,
GSP29vnyps31u:350: tarhi śrutyā tatsiddhiḥ śrutiprāmāṇyanirṇayamantareṇa kathaṃ syāt ? /
GSP29vnyps31u:351: tatprāmāṇyaṃ ca nityanirdeṣatayābhyupagamyate cet, kathaṃ tatra parataḥ
GSP29vnyps31u:352: prāmāṇyetpattiḥ ? vaktṛguṇādhīnaṃ vākyānāṃ prāmāṇyamiti hi vaḥ siddhāntaḥ
GSP29vnyps31u:353: nirdeṣataiva guṇaḥ, iti tadadhīnatayā tatra parataḥ prāmāṇyamiti cenna,
GSP29vnyps31u:359: viśeṣaṇamitīṣyate, tadapi na, parataḥ prāmāṇye nirṇīte
GSP29vnyps31u:361: tatpramāvyavacchedāya viśeṣaṇam, saviśeṣaṇaśvāsau hetuḥ parataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ
GSP29vnyps31u:365: na cāsiddhivyavacchedāya viśeṣaṇaṃ yuktam; siddhatve tu parataḥ
GSP29vnyps31u:369: doṣābhāvādhīnatve parataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ siddhamiti cenna, tadadhīnatvābhāvāt,
GSP29vnyps31u:371: astu vā tadadhīnatvam, tathāpi vede tu na doṣaḥ /
GSP29vnyps31u:372: guṇamantareṇa doṣābhāvo na ghaṭata iti cet,
GSP29vnyps31u:374: bhāvāntarābhāvavādino doṣābhāvopi guṇa eveti cenna, svābhāvāntareṇa tannirvāhāt /
GSP29vnyps31u:375: na hi tasyāpi śītābhāva uṣṇa eva, anuṣṇāśīte tadasiddheḥ /
GSP29vnyps31u:377: tadvadatrāpi saguṇeṣvāptavākyeṣu vaktṛguṇarahiteṣu vedavākyeṣu ca doṣābhāvaḥ samānaḥ //
GSP29vnyps31u:378: nyā. pa. śa. 16 nanu śabdānāṃ svataḥ prāmāṇye buddhādivākyamapi svataḥ
GSP29vnyps31u:380: na syāt, svatastvasyotsargarūpatvāt, virodhiviśeṣe ca tasyānanupraveśāt /
GSP29vnyps31u:381: uktaṃ cāgamaprāmāṇye--- “naiva śabde svato doṣāḥ prāmāṇyaparipanthinaḥ /
GSP29vnyps31u:392: nyā. pa. śa. 17 athaiva brūṣe---kāraṇaguṇadoṣayorabhāve tatprayojyayoḥ prāmāṇyāprāmāṇyayordvayorapyasaṃbhavādraśyantarāyogācca
GSP29vnyps31u:394: hetunivṛttistatkāryaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nivartayet, na tu nityamiti cet,
GSP29vnyps31u:398: yadyapi pūrvapratyayasyakāraṇatvamiṣṭam, tathāpi tasyāpavargadaśāsthasya guṇadoṣādirūpasamastasaṃskārapratyarthitayā na tajjanyasya guṇahetuteti /
GSP29vnyps31u:399: yacca, prāmāṇyaṃ parato jñāyate, iti prayuktam, tatra jñānāntareṇa jñānāntarasvabhāvavedanābhyupagamāt siddhasādhanatā /
GSP29vnyps31u:400_0: parata eveti vivakṣāyāmīdṛśaṃ jñānaṃ prameti lakṣaṇataḥ sarvapramāsaṅgrāhiṇi jñāne
GSP29vnyps31u:400_1: pārameśvare ca vijñāne tadasaṃbhavaḥ; na hi tābhyāṃ svapramātvaṃ na gṛhītam, lakṣaṇāvyāptikiñcijjñatvādiprasaṅgāt
GSP29vnyps31u:400_2: atonyatra parata eveti niyama iti cet, tadapi na, taddṛṣṭāntenaiva pratiprayoktuṃ
GSP29vnyps31u:402: kathaṃ tarhi idaṃ pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ veti saṃśayāvakāśaḥ ? iti cenna,
GSP29vnyps31u:404: bhavati muhuḥ śuktikārajatamohādandhīkṛtadhiyaḥ kaladhautepi tathopalabhyamāne yathopalambhamidaṃ rajatameva vā pūrvavacchuktirajataṃ veti purataḥ /
GSP29vnyps31u:405: tathātrāpi gṛhyamāṇepi prāmāṇye kimidaṃ pramāṇameva sat pramāṇatayopalambhate ? uta, bādhāt pūrvabhramavadapramāṇaṃ sat ? iti saṃśayo yuktaḥ /
GSP29vnyps31u:406: tathāpi sandehasahena kiṃ svatograhaṇena ? niścayastu parādhīna eveti cet,
GSP29vnyps31u:407: kimasmadapekṣayā grahaṇamagrahaṇaṃ vā niyantuṃ śakyam ? siddho hi grahaṇaprakāraḥ parīkṣakairanusaraṇīyaḥ
GSP29vnyps31u:408: siddhireva svataḥ kathamiti cet, ittham---jñānaṃ svālambanaṃ prakāśayat svayamapi jñānāntaranirapekṣaṃ prakāśate, iti tāvat sarvavedāntisaṃmatam /
GSP29vnyps31u:410: nyā. pa. śa. 18 smṛtyaprāmāṇyavādepyapūrvārthagocaratayā smṛtivilakṣaṇaścāviparyayātmā cābādhātmā ca, vādhādeḥ pūrvaṃ tatprasaṅgābhāvāt /
GSP29vnyps31u:413: ato yat tadviṣayatvalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ paścāt tenaiva vyavasthāpyate,
GSP29vnyps31u:415_0: nyā. pa. śa. 19 nanvevaṃ saṃśayatvādilakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyamapi svayaṃprakāśenānuvyavasāyena
GSP29vnyps31u:415_1: vā prathamamave grahītuṃ śakyam; tathāpi viparyayatvalakṣaṇaṃ na tathā, gṛhyamāṇavaiparītyasya
GSP29vnyps31u:417: tatremamaṃśamādāyaiva cāntataḥ pasvataḥ prāmāṇyasamarthanapravṛtteḥ, tatra doṣābhāvādevādāvaprāmāṇyānutpatteḥ
GSP29vnyps31u:418: tata eva cāprāmāṇyapramityasaṃbhavāt, svata eva ca
GSP29vnyps31u:420: iti kavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau śabdādhyāye prathamamāhnikam
